==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
One possibility is that {{lang|zh|早}} is a pictograph of [[sun]] ({{zh-l|*日}}) over the [[horizon]]. However, it is also possible that {{lang|zh|早}} was originally a pictograph of a particular type of [[acorn]]. The shells of these [[acorns]] would be used to make a dark-colored [[dye]]. This color indicated the [[darkness]] before [[sunrise]] and the symbol then took on the meaning of ''[[early]]'' or ''[[fast]]''.
